text: Victor Garber (September 14, 1919 - April 7, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Wyoming House of Representatives from 1959 to 1965 and again from 1979 to 1981. He was a businessman in the agriculture industry.http://wyoarchives.state.wy.us/pdf/WyomingBlueBookFour.pdf He was born in Big Horn, Wyoming. Garber turned 100 in September 2019. He died in Big Horn on April 7, 2021 at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Wyoming Category:Businesspeople from Wyoming Category:American centenarians
title: Victor Garber (politician)
